backend/main.mo: Defines actor data types for moods, chat, user profiles, analytics, revenue, and market metadata with comparison utilities but no operational logic shown.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing an admin-bootstrap frontend flow and listing affected files, components, tests, and confidence level.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend files including components, hooks, utilities, and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base definitions with OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes and global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that loads the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication, admin bootstrap, routing, session tracking, and navigation across all major views.
frontend/src/components/AdminUserDrilldo: Loads and displays detailed analytics for a specific user with tabs, stats, error handling, and navigation back to the admin dashboard.
Renders a user's mood history using calendar and chart views, with date selection and mood entry lookups.
frontend/src/components/AIChat.tsx: AI chat interface managing session-scoped messages, session context, typing simulation, and user–AI message exchange using a generator API.
frontend/src/components/AnalyticsDashboa: Shows aggregated analytics and user records for admins, with loading/error states and user drilldown navigation.
frontend/src/components/AnonymousLogin.t: Handles both Internet Identity and guest login flows with profile setup, error handling, and activity logging.
frontend/src/components/AppMarketSetting: Provides UI for viewing and editing app marketplace metadata and pricing configuration with save actions and loading states.
frontend/src/components/ChatRoom.tsx: Displays a chat room interface with message fetching, auto-scroll, and sending messages via mutations.
frontend/src/components/CreateChatRoomDi: Provides a dialog to create a new chat room with name and topic inputs and submission via mutation.
frontend/src/components/Dashboard.tsx: Renders the main dashboard showing chat rooms, private threads, date info, and dialogs for creating rooms or private chats.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Shows a simple footer with copyright text and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays the top navigation bar with user info, menu items, admin options, and logout controls.
frontend/src/components/MonthlyMoodTrend: Computes and displays weekly average mood scores for the current month in a bar chart format.
frontend/src/components/MoodCalendar.tsx: Renders a month or week calendar view of mood entries with clickable mood-colored day cells. Handles navigation between months and highlights selected and current days.
frontend/src/components/MoodEditor.tsx: Provides a form to create or edit a mood entry for a specific date, loading existing data and submitting updates. Manages mood selection, notes, and actor readiness state.
frontend/src/components/MoodHistory.tsx: Displays the user's mood history with charts, a calendar, and error handling, allowing selection of a date to edit its entry. Switches to MoodEditor when a date is chosen.
frontend/src/components/MoodTracker.tsx: Allows users to log a new mood with optional notes and saves it through a mutation. Includes actor readiness checks and error handling.
frontend/src/components/OverallMoodTrend: Computes monthly average mood scores from history and displays them as a bar chart. Shows fallback text when no data is available.
frontend/src/components/PresentationView: Displays a sequence of presentation slides with navigation controls and thumbnails. Supports moving between slides and downloading the presentation.
frontend/src/components/PrivateChat.tsx: Renders a private messaging UI that loads messages, auto-scrolls, and sends new messages using query hooks and Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/StartPrivateChat: Provides a dialog for creating a new private chat thread by entering another user's principal and triggering a create-thread mutation.
frontend/src/components/WeeklyMoodInsigh: Displays weekly mood insights with summaries, clusters, anomalies, and loading/error states using data from a query hook.
frontend/src/components/WeeklyMoodSummar: Computes and shows the current week's average mood score, label, and insight based on mood entries.
frontend/src/components/WeeklyMoodTrendl: Generates a weekly mood trendline chart with daily averages, emojis, and a linear regression indicator.
frontend/src/hooks/guestAuthStore.ts: Implements a shared guest-session store with localStorage persistence, migration, and pub‑sub updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useActivityLogging.ts: Provides hooks to log user or guest activity events to the backend, including login, navigation, and interactions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminBootstrap.ts: Handles post-login admin setup by checking admin status and attempting to claim admin rights once per session.
frontend/src/hooks/useGuestAuth.ts: Provides guest authentication state and helpers for logging in, tracking, and clearing guest sessions.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook to manage login, logout, identity loading, and login status states.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls in React Query hooks for fetching and mutating mood data, user profiles, messages, analytics, and related records.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionTracking.ts: Tracks user session duration and periodically or on unload reports it to the backend when supported.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and OKLCH-based light and dark theme color variables for global styling.
frontend/src/lib/ai/constraints.ts: Defines AI response safety constraints and utilities to validate responses for diagnosis, therapy claims, reflection, and permission checks.
frontend/src/lib/ai/generator.ts: Generates AI chat responses by selecting stages, applying templates, enforcing constraints, and updating session context.
frontend/src/lib/ai/routing.ts: Determines conversation stage based on keywords and context, handles crisis detection, and updates session state.
frontend/src/lib/ai/sessionContext.ts: Manages chat session context with sessionStorage, including initialization, saving, clearing, and summarizing state.
frontend/src/lib/ai/templates.ts: Defines stage-specific response templates and follow‑up questions for the conversation system.
frontend/src/lib/ai/templateUtils.ts: Selects and adapts response templates, extracts key phrases, and combines responses with optional follow-up questions.
frontend/src/lib/ai/types.ts: Contains enums and interfaces for conversation stages, session context, response constraints, and stage responses.
frontend/src/lib/linearRegression.ts: Implements simple least‑squares linear regression and returns slope, intercept, and a predict function.
frontend/src/lib/moodErrors.ts: Classifies errors into availability, permission, or unknown categories based on message content.
frontend/src/lib/timestampUtils.ts: Provides utilities for converting between local dates and IC nanosecond timestamps, plus helpers for date formatting.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility for merging class names using clsx and tailwind‑merge.
frontend/src/lib/weeklySummaryText.ts: Generates weekly mood summaries, labels, and insight text with non‑judgmental wording.
frontend/src/lib/weekUtils.ts: Provides week‑based date utilities, including week boundaries, day indexing, and weekday formatting.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Entry point that renders the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/types/backend-extended.ts: Defines extended TypeScript interfaces for backend-aligned data models including mood logs, user records, analytics, and marketplace metadata.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, including support for hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme extensions, custom colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, known issues, and feature requests related to restoring admin access via Internet Identity after redeploys.
